column5: Which of the two months would be best? I have gone in July and have had great fishing. But I had to skip this year and now I am unable to book my normal time. Thaks for the imput.

I am leaving tonight, in about 4 hours. Will let you know when I get back. Been there in Sept in the past, one time, and had a blast. I hear August is primetime though. In reality, I think the system is so good, it doesnt matter when you go.
